mapper.select: select product_price.company_id, product_price.product_id, product_price.price, product_price.youji, product_market_share.product_type, product_market_share.market_share, product_market_share.need, product_market_share.sale, product_market_share.stockoun, product_market_share.stock from product_price, product_market_share where product_price.company_id = #{companyid} and product_price.quarter = #{quater} and product_price.product_id = product_market_share.product_id

select cp.cost, pms.company_id, pms.product_id, pp.youji, pp.price, pms.sale from product_price pp, product_market_share pms, company_product cp where pp.company_id = #{companyid} and pp.quarter = #{quater} and pms.product_id = pp.product_id and cp.id = pp.product_id

select pms.need need, company.name name from company, product_market_share pms, ( select competition_id from product_market_share where company_id = #{companyid} and quarter = #{quater} ) subpms where pms.competition_id = subpms.competition_id and company.id = pms.company_id and company.competition_id = subpms.competition_id

select company.id id, cm.market_id mi, cm.is_phy isphy, company.name name from company, company_market cm, ( select competition_id from company where id = #{companyid} ) subc where company.competition_id = subc.competition_id and cm.company_id = company.id and cm.quarter = #{quater}
